src:
Taj ludi, ludi Spartak: Čaušić i Tula poharali Moskvu (VIDEO)
Tim iz glavnog grada Rusije izgubio od Arsenala - 0:1

04 Nov 2019

To može samo Spartak iz Moskve! Sve je ukazivalo da će novi trener Tedesko pronašao način da izvuče ekipu iz lavirinta krize. U gradskom derbiju savladana je Lokomotiva (3:1), zatim je ostvaren Kup trijumf protiv jakog Rostova (2:1). I kada se činilo da je povratak u vrh tabele neminovnost – usledio je potop. Spartak je izgubio od Arsenala iz Tule na Otkrijte Areni – 0:1.
Gosti su defanzivnom varijatnom, sa petoricom igrača u poslednjoj liniji, došli na Otkrijte Arenu da se brane. Ali dočekali su svoj trenutak. Desio se već u 16. minutu. Bila je to odličan akcija. Posle dobre razmene pasova lopta je došla na desni bek, odakle je centrirao Kombarov, a Luštenko je skočio i pogodio dalji ugao.
Za goste je svih 90 minuta odigrao nekadašnji vezista Crvene zvezde Goran Čaušić .
Spartak je poražen sedmi put ove sezone. Moskovljani su trenutno na osmoj poziciji i od evropske zone ih dele devet bodova. Jako težak posao ih očekuje. Navijači neće imati mnogo strpljenja.

RUSIJA 1 - 15. KOLO:


Subota

Ufa - Lokomotiva 1:1 (0:0)/Bizjak 72 - Ignjatjev 90/Dinamo - Akhmat 1:1 (0:1)/Ordets 90 - Ponce 43/Soči - Tambov 1:2 (1:1)/Noboa 44 - Kostjukov 41, Melkadze 56/Zenit - CSKA 1:1 (0:1)/Erohin 73 - Vlašić 45/

Nedelja

Krasnodar - Rostov 2:2 (0:2)/Ignjatijević 90+3, Spajić 90+5 - Jonov 32 i 41/

Ponedeljak


Ural - Orenburg 1:2 (0:2)/Bicfali 64 - Famejeh 4, Alves 45/Krila Sovjetov - Rubin 0:0Spartak - Arsenal Tula 0:1 (0:0)/Luštenko 16/

NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
That crazy, crazy Spartacus: Causic and Tula raid Moscow (VIDEO)
Team from the Russian capital lost to Arsenal - 0: 1

04 Nov 2019

Only Spartak from Moscow can do that! All indications were that new coach Tedesco would find a way to get the team out of the maze of crisis. Lokomotiv (3: 1) was defeated in the city derby, then the Cup triumph against strong Rostov (2: 1). And when the return to the top of the table seemed inevitable - a deluge ensued. Spartak lost to Arsenal from Tula at Discover Arena - 0: 1.
The guests of the defensive variant, with five players in the back line, came to the Discover Arena to defend themselves. But they did wait for their moment. It happened already in the 16th minute. It was a great action. After a good pass of the pass, the ball came to the right back, from which Kombarov was centered, and Lustenko jumped and hit a far corner.
Former Red Star midfielder Goran Causic played for the entire 90 minutes.
Spartak was defeated for the seventh time this season. The Russians are currently in eighth position and have nine points from the European zone. Very hard work awaits them. Fans won't have much patience.

RUSSIA 1 - 15TH ROUND:


Saturday

Ufa - Lokomotiv 1: 1 (0: 0) / Bizjak 72 - Ignatyev 90 / Dynamo - Akhmat 1: 1 (0: 1) / Ordets 90 - Ponce 43 / Sochi - Tambov 1: 2 (1: 1) / Noboa 44 - Kostyukov 41, Melkadze 56 / Zenit - CSKA Moscow 1: 1 (0: 1) / Erohin 73 - Vlasic 45 /

Sunday

Krasnodar - Rostov 2: 2 (0: 2) / Ignjatijevic 90 + 3, Spajic 90 + 5 - Jonov 32 and 41 /

Monday


Ural - Orenburg 1: 2 (0: 2) / Bicfali 64 - Famejeh 4, Alves 45 / Wings of the Soviets - Rubin 0: 0Spartak - Arsenal Tula 0: 1 (0: 0) / Lustenko 16 /

NOTE: Odds are subject to change
